conclusion: Analyze forces using Newton's laws of motion
Wooden block P with mass m slides on wooden board ab with mass M on horizontal ground
Coefficient of kinetic friction between board ab and ground is μ1, between block P and board ab is μ2
Frictional force between block P and board ab is F_friction, block = μ2 mg
Acceleration of block P is a_P = μ2 g
Reaction force from board ab on block P is F_reaction = μ2 mg
Force exerted by block P on board ab is F_block on board = μ2 mg
Acceleration of board ab is a_ab = μ2 mg / M
Frictional force exerted by ground on board ab is F_friction, ground = μ2 mg
Final answer: frictional force exerted by ground on board ab is μ2 mg
